name: #4 Law of Faith
description:
The Laws of Manifestation

#4 - Law of Faith

Faith and religion are not the same - however they do both involve ultimate trust in something greater.

Trusting that the seeds you have planted will bloom into what you need can be hard, but one thing I find super helpful is remembering 'this or something better' - and then letting it go.

If you spend all of your energy waiting for that thing to happen, won't you miss the opportunities that pass by you? Those opportunities that seem small, but could roll into something incredible.

Instead, I choose to let my manifestations go. To practice a conscious detachment from the want, and instead to continue on. Trusting that things will fall into place when they are meant too.

And guess what? Once I let go of the attachment, things happen. And if they don't - something even better comes along later.

Don't believe me? Try it yourself.
